Title: Relates to pricing changes for online grocery delivery services
Summary: Requires the clear and conspicuous disclosure of pricing changes for online grocery delivery services; imposes a fine of not more than one hundred dollars for the first offense and not more than two hundred fifty dollars for a second or subsequent offense for violations.
LawCode: Add ยง399-l, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the disclosure of pricing changes for online grocery delivery services
